channel.title: Marty Thierry (martylouis) | Freelance Web Designer in Destin, Florida
channel.description: Marty Louis Thierry is UX designer, developer and maintainer of websites and brands. Located in Destin, Florida. Follow @martylouis on Twitter, GitHub and Instagram.
